name: 葛瑞斐
objective:
本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
Through short writing assignments and class discussion, this course will help develop students’ English writing skills and strategies for composition.  In the course of practicing such skills, we will follow from our reading class and take as our general theme  exploration and discovery, as we develop descriptive and analytic paragraphs in response to the readings and films.
